puzzle.help: 1. In an effort to complicate signposts, you're given the task to have signposts reach other by no less than two turns. 2. In other words, you have to place walls on the board so that a maze of signposts is formed. In this maze: 3. In order to go from one signpost to the other, you have to turn at least twice. 4. Walls can't touch horizontally or vertically. 5. All the signposts and empty spaces must form an orthogonally continuous area.
